LocationPicker.getLocationFailed: Talephera kupeza malowa, chonde onani zosintha zovomerezeka
LocationPicker.title: Dzinalo
LocationPicker.permissionPrompt: Tiyenera kupeza chidziwitso cha malo anu kuti tithandizire ntchito zabwino, ndizololedwa?

LocationPicker.locationTimeout: Kukhazikitsa nthawi, onetsetsani kuti chipangizocho chatsegulidwa ndikuyesanso
LocationPicker.locationUnavailable: Malo omwe ali pano sangathe kupezeka, chonde onani ntchito ya chipangizocho
